33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Hudhaifah bin Al-Yaman narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"By the One in Whose Hand is my soul! The Hour will not be established until you fight your A'immah, and you strike each other with your swords, and your world will be inherited by the evilest among you

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأَمْرِ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَالنَّهْىِ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Commanding Good and Forbidding Evil
